short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension will alert user in google meet when any participant in meet call his/her name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1: Open Your Meet Link start meeting
2: Right Click on Extension -> Click On Option's Page -> Fill Information
3: Click ON Save button
4: Turn on Caption
5: Click on Start Button

Now Just sit relax When any professor call your name you will get alert!!

Note:
We are not collecting any of your data
